name: Platformer Clicker
description:
How to Play

  • Get points by BOUNCING on YELLOW cubes.
  • PURCHASE more players, upgrades, and other using shop at the bottom left.
  • Unlock new areas and shortcuts by purchasing PLATFORMS.
  • Use the RED buttons to increase MAX PLAYERS

Movement
WASD to move current character.
SPACE to jump with currrent character.
MOUSE to use the on screen buttons for purchasing
